skills.Name: Dark Smash: Death Mark
skills.Description: Stacks Death Mark when using damage skills.

skills.Name: Contagion: Death Mark
skills.Description: Stacks Death Mark when using damage skills.

skills.Name: Ancient Sword Mastery
skills.Description: Increases P. Atk. by 5.2 when using an ancient sword.

skills.Name: Light Armor Mastery
skills.Description: When equipped with light armor, increases P. Def. by 2.2 and Evasion by 3, and decreases the enemy's Critical Rate/Damage by 5%.

skills.Name: Magic Immunity
skills.Description: Increases M. Def. by 41 and Resistance to magic damage by 5.

skills.Name: Soul Mastery
skills.Description: Absorbs souls. 294 or more XP is needed to absorb a soul. There is a 15% chance of absorbing an additional soul on a Critical. Maximum of 12 souls can be absorbed.

skills.Name: True Berserker
skills.Description: Decreases P. Def. by 5% and Evasion by 2. Increases P. Atk. and Atk. Spd. by 5% and Accuracy by 2. Continuously consumes MP proportionately to your level.

skills.Name: Life to Soul
skills.Description: Cannibalizes your own life to increase your soul by 1.

skills.Name: Dark Smash
skills.Description: Unleash a powerful smash with dark energy, dealing 460 Physical Damage. Regains MP.

skills.Name: Contagion
skills.Description: Mastering the dark arts, you exploit the dark energies of your target and destroy their life force for 500 Physical Damage. Increases Power upon the consumption of up to 5 souls. Requires an ancient sword or a sword. Over-hit. Ignores Shield Defense.

skills.Name: Crushing Pain
skills.Description: Raise your weapon as you crash down destruction and despair on your target, dealing 740 Physical Damage. Consumes up to $s3 souls and requires 2 stacks of Death Mark.

skills.Name: Spread Wing
skills.Description: Spreads wings to attack nearby enemies with 460 Physical Damage. Requires 1 Death Mark.

skills.Name: Hurricane Rush
skills.Description: Shoulder charge the target to Stun them for 3 seconds and dealing 80 Physical Damage.

skills.Description: Increases P. Atk. by 5.2 when using an ancient sword.

skills.Name: Fast Recovery

skills.Name: Body Reconstruction
skills.Description: Recovers 86HP per second for 15 seconds by reconstructing your body.
